Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the countryside, the ideals he intensively pursued before his unexpected death at the age of 37, the struggle against ruling circles, and his efforts to spread socialist values through youth literature and theater.
